letters.description: Assess current dietary patterns, nutrient deficiencies, and bio-individual requirements.
Focus on gut health and enzymatic function to ensure maximum nutrient bio-availability.
Identify lifestyle, environmental, and emotional factors that impact metabolic health.
Develop a customized, whole-foods-based nutrition protocol to restore systemic balance.
Align dietary changes with sleep hygiene, stress management, and movement practices.
Implement incremental behavioral shifts to ensure long-term adherence and success.
Monitor progress and refine the approach to maintain lifelong health and energy.
